Menu

Class Menu is the homepage interface for the user

Functions
_topicItemUpdate
_topicItemUpdate(
menuItemEvent
)

makes appropriate update to topic based on parameter

Parameters
menuItemEvent

either  drop, rename, loaded, context-start, select, or new to make the appropriate update to a topic item Returns:

None

See Also

Calls functions updateTweet, createTweet, deleteTweet and tweetFactory.load

_tweetItemUpdate
_tweetItemUpdate(
menuItemEvent
)

makes appropriate update of tweet based on parameter

Parameters
menuItemEvent

either  delete, rename, loaded, context-start, select, or new to make the appropriate update to a tweet item Returns:

None

See Also

Calls functions updateTweet, getTweetById, <textEditor.start>, <textEditor.reset> and <textEditor.setTitle>
